Self.Wiki: Determines to Havok parameters to use for foot inverse kinematics (IK).

onOffHokanTime.Wiki: Determines the interpolation time when IK is toggled on and off.

onOffGain.Wiki: Determines the amount of gain applied when IK is toggled on and off.

groundAscendingGain.Wiki: Determines the amount of gain applied when the ground height increases.

groundDescendingGain.Wiki: Determines the amount of gain applied when the ground height decreases.

footRaisedGain.Wiki: Determines the amount of gain applied when a foot is raised.

footPlantedGain.Wiki: Determines the amount of gain applied when a foot is planted to the ground.

footLockingGain.Wiki: Determines the amount of gain applied when a foot is locked or unlocked.

ankleRotationGain.Wiki: Determines the amount of gain applied when an ankle is rotating.

twistKneeAxisType.Wiki: Axial direction that ignores rotation of the knee joint for twisting.

footPlacementOn.Wiki: If ON, foot placement is active.

isSlopeSlideOffset.Wiki: If ON, apply slope offset adjustment when sliding down a slope.

forwardUndulationRate.Wiki: Specifies the amount of front/back lean against the slope when the slope is tilted.

sideUndulationRate.Wiki: Specifies the amount of right/left lean against the slope when the slope is tilted.

undulationGain.Wiki: The gain value used for tilting the slope when the slope is tilted.
